name: Mordley Greg P.I.
description:
Following a mysterious tip, Mordley Greg now finds herself at a curious mansion in search for her father.

Mordley Greg P.I. is a top down action-adventure game inspired by the classics of the NES and SNES era. As Mordley explores the mansion, she relies on her trusty umbrella and father's revolver to solve puzzles and defeat the test subjects of the mansion. 

Controls

Keyboard:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • E - interact
  • Left Shift - Dodge
  • Space Bar - Melee attack
  • Enter - Reload/Rotate Cylinder
  • Hold Right Shift - Aim
  •  Space Bar (while holding right shift)- Shoot

Controller:

  • A - interact
  • B - Dodge
  • X - Melee attack
  • Y - Reload/Rotate Cylinder
  • L1/L2 - Aim
  • R2 - Shoot
  • L Joystick - Move
